reporting-org.narrative: United Nations Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs

title.narrative: Saving lives and limbs via provision of community based Risk Education to IDPs and Returnees of the newly retaken and return areas in Ninewah, Anbar, and Salahaddin, at the same time conducting IED risk education campaign and integrate peace-building element to Risk Education messages.

description.narrative: The project overall goal is to save lives and limbs of the civilians of the ISIS impacted areas in Ninewah, Anbar, and Salahaddin while the project Objectives can be summarized as following: Supporting RE education campaign to educate the public, IDPs and Returnees about the risks of EH, at the same time strengthening reporting capacities at local level focusing on the impacted areas in Ninewah, Anbar and Salahaddin governorates. The nation wide risk education campaign will utilize both traditional media i.e. audio/ video/ printed materials and social media, and new innovative RE games.Help sustaining peace via Integrating peace-building and reconciliation elements to the community-based risk education sessions. Thus this project supports saving lives and helps sustain peace and prevent potential conflicts. To do so a total of 70 Community Focal Points (volunteers: teachers, activists, community/religious leaders and youth) will be trained via Accredited local partners, to provide urgent risk education to a total of 30000 civilians from ISIS impacted areas in Ninewah, Anbar, and Salahaddin. The IED education campaign in the impacted areas in Iraq that will both educate the public, IDPs and Returnees about the risks at the same time strengthening reporting capacities at local level focusing on the impacted areas in Ninewah, Anbar, and Salahaddin governorates. The IED nation wide risk education campaign will utilize both interesting traditional media i.e. audio/ video/ printed materials and social media (Facebook, and You Tube portals), and new innovative RE games. Help sustaining peace via Integrating peace-building and reconciliation elements to the community-based risk education sessions. Thus this project support saving lives, limbs and sights and help sustain peace and prevent potential conflicts.
